description: User clicked on a pricing plan (Starter, PRO, or MAX) from the landing page pricing section
User initiated the Stripe checkout flow for a paid plan
User dropped a file to import transactions (conversion funnel top)
User successfully imported transactions from a file (key conversion event)
File import failed with an error (churn indicator)
User created a new transaction category in data library
User deleted a statement/report from data library (potential churn signal)
User sent a message to the AI chat assistant
User clicked a quick AI prompt chip from the dashboard
User clicked to view details of a financial health score card
User set or updated a budget limit for a spending category
User manually changed a transaction's category (engagement signal)
User toggled between monthly and annual billing on pricing page
